function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Respondents planning to travel despite COVID-19 risk","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases, including COVID-19","Mitigation":"Educate respondents on the importance of considering public health and safety, encourage alternative travel plans","Technologies":"Communication and educational tools, virtual travel experiences","People":"Respondents, travelers","Owner":"Health organizations, travel agencies"},{"Description":"High level of variation in reported travel plans","Impact":"Difficulty in predicting and managing travel-related contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement flexible travel policies, monitor and adapt to changing travel patterns, prioritize outdoor and socially distanced activities","Technologies":"Data analytics, monitoring systems, outdoor activity planning tools","People":"Travel industry, public health authorities","Owner":"Travel companies, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Dependence of planned vacation behavior on COVID-19 risk perception and anxiety","Impact":"Influence of irrational fears on travel decisions, potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Provide accurate information on COVID-19 risks and safety measures, offer mental health support for anxiety management, promote responsible travel behaviors","Technologies":"Informational websites, mental health apps, travel advisories","People":"Travelers, individuals with anxiety disorders","Owner":"Health organizations, mental health organizations"}]}
